text: Suntec City is a major multi-use development in Marina Centre, a subzone of the Downtown Core in Singapore. Construction began on 18 January 1992 (with earthworks) followed by full completion and opening on 22 July 1997. It had Suntec Convention Centre, the five towers and a shopping mall. Suntec City was renovated between 2012 and 2015.SINGAPORE'S SUNTEC TO RECEIVE UPGRADES IN 2012. www.tsnn.com. title: Suntec City
